About.Name: UTF-16 object
About.Author: Darkwire Software
About.Comment: Converts between UTF16 text and numeric representation, and UTF8/ANSI. (v1.4)

ActionMenu: Store UTF16 string at memory address
ExpressionMenu: Convert UTF16 Char to UTF16 Int
Convert UTF16 Int to UTF16 Char
Read UTF16 String from UTF16 Memory
Convert UTF8 Memory to UTF16 String

Actions.Title: %o : Store UTF-16 string %0 at memory address %1 (with null excluded = %2)
Parameters: Exclude null terminator? (0 or 1, you probably want 0)

Expressions.Title: UTF16StringFromUTF16Memory$(
Parameters: Num of UTF16 chars (or -1 if null-terminated)

Expressions.Title: UTF16StringFromUTF8Memory$(
Parameters: Num of UTF8 chars (or -1 if null-terminated)
